mapper.update: UPDATE temp_user as u LEFT JOIN temp_duty as d ON u.duty_id = d.duty_id SET u.authority_code = CASE WHEN d.duty_name NOT LIKE '%장' AND d.duty_name != '대표' THEN 'A1' WHEN d.duty_name LIKE '%장' THEN 'A2' WHEN d.duty_name = '대표' THEN 'A2' WHEN d.duty_name IS NULL THEN 'A3' END
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_id, user_password, user_name, pos_id, duty_id, dept_id, authority_code, current_state, flag) SELECT user_id, user_id, user_name, pos_id, duty_id, dept_id, authority_code, '재직', '인사연동' FROM temp_user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM user)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, pos_id, duty_id, dept_id, authority_code FROM temp_user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM user)
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET current_state = '퇴직' WHERE flag = '인사연동' AND current_state = '재직' AND user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM temp_user) OR user_id = ANY(SELECT user_id FROM temp_user WHERE current_state = '퇴직')

UPDATE user INNER JOIN temp_user ON user.user_id = temp_user.user_id
user.user_name = temp_user.user_name, user.pos_id = temp_user.pos_id, user.duty_id = temp_user.duty_id, user.dept_id = temp_user.dept_id, user.authority_code = temp_user.authority_code
WHERE user.user_name != temp_user.user_name OR user.pos_id != temp_user.pos_id OR user.duty_id != temp_user.duty_id OR user.dept_id != temp_user.dept_id OR user.authority_code != temp_user.authority_code AND user.current_state = '재직' AND user.flag = '인사연동'
